basics.name: Shubham Mote
basics.label: Python Full-Stack Developer | React.js, Node.js | 3.5+ Years in Data-Driven Solutions & Scalable Web Applications | Expertise in Algorithms, SQL, and Docker
basics.summary: Python Full-Stack Developer with 3.5+ years of experience designing and developing robust software solutions, particularly adept at handling large volumes of data and applying algorithms. Proven expertise as a full-stack developer with strong Javascript programming, responsive web design using React, and cross-browser UI development. Skilled in Python, Node.js, SQL, and infrastructure automation with Docker.

work.summary: Developing robust backend services and responsive React.js UIs for enterprise tools. Migrated legacy systems to TypeScript and implemented centralized authentication systems.
highlights: Developed robust backend services, including a critical NodeJS service for SOW Tracker, handling high-volume API requests and reducing response times by 40%, demonstrating ability to process large volumes of data efficiently.

Engineered responsive React.js UIs for enterprise tools (SOW Tracker, Screener, User Control), ensuring cross-browser and cross-platform compatibility and enhancing usability through modern user interface frameworks.

Migrated PharmaACE.com to TypeScript with React and Node.js, improving type safety, scalability, and SEO performance, aligning with best practices for web application development and responsive web design.
Built a centralized User Management system with JWT-based authentication and RBAC, enabling secure access across multiple applications, demonstrating strong programming skills and solution design.
Rebuilt the corporate website using React.js and Node.js, optimized for SEO and cross-browser compatibility, applying responsive web design principles.
Integrated Redux to enhance app state management, improving frontend responsiveness and leveraging modern user interface libraries.
Wrote unit tests with Jest, increasing code coverage and reducing deployment bugs, contributing to robust software solutions.
Automated CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions, streamlining deployments and improving release efficiency, showcasing experience with infrastructure automation.

work.summary: Engineered responsive UI components and built scalable backend APIs. Partnered with UI/UX teams to optimize app performance.
highlights: Engineered responsive UI components with React.js, Tailwind CSS, HTML5, and Material UI, demonstrating strong Javascript programming and responsive web design expertise.
Built scalable backend APIs in NodeJS/ExpressJS, ensuring robust data handling and performance, contributing to comprehensive full-stack development.
Partnered with UI/UX teams to optimize app performance and reduce load times, focusing on cross-browser and cross-platform UI development.

work.summary: Managed a 15-member video team, gaining leadership, client delivery & management skills.
highlights: Gained leadership, client delivery & management skills

projects.name: SOW Tracker
projects.description: Enterprise-grade tool designed for managing Statements of Work within the financial domain, demonstrating expertise in full-stack development.
highlights: Developed robust software solutions to process large volumes of data, reducing manual overhead and API latency by 40% for key stakeholders, leveraging React, NodeJS, and Docker.

projects.name: Screener
projects.description: Candidate screening platform showcasing scalable web application framework development and integration capabilities.
highlights: Integrated Microsoft APIs for automated interview scheduling, cutting manual coordination in high-volume hiring, demonstrating strong programming skills and solution design.

projects.name: PharmaACE.com
projects.description: Rebuilt the company's primary website using modern user interface libraries, optimized for global accessibility and responsive web design.
highlights: Improved SEO and scalability, resulting in higher traffic and better global accessibility, showcasing cross-browser and cross-platform UI development expertise.
